}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2976400701" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device uses a single-chip Ralink IC, probably RT3573.
{{WiFiCert|WFA12488|09/22/2011}}
==Links of Interest== ===Drivers=== *[http://www.wireless-driver.com/buffalo-wli-uc-g450-wireless-windows-xp-vista-win7-driver/ Driver on wireless-driver.com] *[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/en/wli-uc-g450-airstation-n450-wireless-n-adapter-downloads.html Driver on Buffalo's US site] (in a 269MB zip file, includes Win8 driver though) ===Vendors=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833162060 On '''Newegg''']
